issues_reports.text: @TMobile Is there a service disruption in TN and NC?  I am unable to use the phone to locate family members
Thanks for the Apple TV subscription, @TMobile! Things like this are why I've been a customer since 2005.

@HunterJCullen What kind of issue did you have with TMo if you don't mind my asking?

@TMobileHelp @TMobile

@lucky225 @TMobile Are they just so incompetent as to be unable to fix the problem? Or do they maybe have a crap customer database with layers upon layers of bandaids and insufficient documentation? @TMobileHelp what gives?
@Mintmobile Why is this network could do this rate  and coverage are so well ? Why T-Mobile allowed them to do so ??

@TMobileHelp Hi.. would love to get this resolved. Here is my worry. If our wifi goes out we have no cell service and that is what im paying for. We moved to Porter Ranch a year ago and i have been paying tmo and using my spectrum wifi to have cell connection.
@TMobileHelp please check towers in 17019, we have a fluke power outage and now no one has signal
Staying with @TMobile after the @sprint merge is what regret looks like. #TMobile cell service has more dead spots than a cemetery.
@tmobile today I will cancel my account of 4 lines over your stupid  activation fee. @Verizon are you ready for a new customer?

Today was the last straw with @TMobile! Had nothing but issues since we got our phones in December 2020! I started having issues with these phones less than a month after getting them! Not sending or receiving messages, text, when connecting to data it tells us there's no (1/3)

Hey y'all just got a text about offering a free gift card because I was affected due to T-Mobile outage. 

This is a phishing text it is not sent via T-Mobile and it showing a screenshot and a link please do not hit that link. 
I'm sure this **** is being done for other carriers
@TMobileHelp I DM’d yall for weeks trying to fix and figure out why it’s so bad, but nothing was resolved and I came to the conclusion your service is just bad
@TMobile T-Mobile actually sucks ***. Always cutting off. Glad I left that trash
@TMobileHelp Honestly I rather not. That ship has sailed long time ago. Like I have said just waiting on the leases to end. You guys had so many times to help and didn't. I say that's too many.

@ATTHelp is full of **** and I advise nobody to every transfer to them. @TMobileHelp I’m sorry for leaving y’all after 7 years but if I come back I need a cheaper plan and new phones! Let’s make a deal. An honest one, not a lying one like @ATTHelp did!

@BoostCare Nothing has been resolved from this issue since day one nothing has been fixed at all. if anything things have actually gotten worse you advertise how you have 5G coverage when in fact you do not have 5G coverage congratulations Boost Mobile you are actually worse than T-Mobile
@NevilleRay @TMobile @Speedtest you are the worst provider i’ve ever had shut ******** up
Should they keep the roof on T-Mobile park today, regardless of rain, so that the noise can filter down toward the field? @Mariners #SeaUsRise #Believe
@TMobileHelp It's not my phone, It's your network.
@TMobile your 5G is trash I’m taking my service too @ATT
@TMobileHelp @NevilleRay Your 5G map is horse crap. You guys put 5G on the phone but the speeds are more like 3G. Seriously stop trying to scam people.
@TMobileHelp need help transferring a number. Have been trying for 2 weeks without success.
@TMobileHelp I signed up a month ago and have been erroneously charged for nearly double the last two months and support still can’t find how the charges are occurring.

With some complicated maneuvers, Alex applied the promotion to the three existing lines, suggested I get the fourth line (prepaid) with @TMobile and transfer it to @ATT to avoid the credit hassle. I did this and ended up with the same problems.

@TMobile Hey you guys said I would be compensated when your service outage got me a parking ticket and it's been over a month since anything has been said to me about it, is the only thing worse than your cell service your customer relations
@TMobile I need help with th fuel rewards app!!! It is not working.
i think t-mobile updated they service my **** great rn
Ugh @TMobile i never got your code so I had to pay for wifi on @Delta … and I pay the extra $50 a month for global access / all flight wifi. 👎🏽👎🏽👎🏽

@mileyVGK I learned to never take these moments for granted anymore because you never know. 

MY short term goal is to attend a Vegas game at T-Mobile soon though but alas, COVID!
Seriously @TMobile why is activating and transferring service to a new phone always such a painful experience.

company_posts.name: T-Mobile Help
company_posts.text: Hi. I'm positive we can turn this around and help you updated your autopay and manage your account. Please DM us with your account information and autopay details. We'll work fast to get this fixed, so you can get back to your weekend. Thanks. ^SharonBaca

company_posts.name: T-Mobile Help
company_posts.text: Hi, Hunny. Thank you for connecting with us. We see you're DM and we'll meet you there to work on your account concerns. We'll help find the best solution for your questions. Thanks. ^SharonBaca

company_posts.name: T-Mobile Help
company_posts.text: Let's make sure your account is set up exactly as you need and help make sure you're covered for internationally calling. DM us your account information and the date/time you made your call to Jamaica. We'll quickly find a solution for you. Thanks. ^SharonBaca
